body.p: We are pleased to offer you the position of with our organization and your joining will be on or before with an annual CTC of Rs.. Your current base location will be with domestic and/or overseas project travel/relocation as per business requirements.

A detailed appointment letter will be issued on actual date of your joining the organization. Your offer has been made based on information furnished by you. However, if there is a discrepancy in the copies of documents or certificates given by you as a proof of above, we retain the right to revoke the offer.
Please confirm your acceptance of this offer in the next 48 hours.
We wish you a long and rewarding career with SecurEyes. Please sign and return the duplicate copy of this letter or email us the confirmation as a token of acceptance
